pullrequest.title: Changes to bullet link param init

content.raw: Earlier in this function (line 72), we check whether the Link is static or kinematic and set the mass and inertia values to zero if so. This was presuming that `this->SetKinematic(...)` was called in Link::Init. So maybe we need to refactor so that the previous check will still work.
content.html: Earlier in this function (line 72), we check whether the Link is static or kinematic and set the mass and inertia values to zero if so. This was presuming that this->SetKinematic(...) was called in Link::Init. So maybe we need to refactor so that the previous check will still work.
